snippet: Sabrina Rubin Erdely, the author of a discredited Rolling Stone article about a rape at a University of Virginia fraternity, issued an apology. The university president issued a statement, as well.
lead_paragraph: Sabrina Rubin Erdely, the author of a discredited Rolling Stone article about a rape at a University of Virginia fraternity, issued an apology. The university president issued a statement, as well.

headline.main: Sabrina Rubin Erdely, Writer of Rolling Stone Rape Article, Issues Statement
